page.title: 08A typical day
page.content: As a housewife and mother, a daughter studing for A levels and a son at preparatory school my day begins early. I take my son to school in Warwick then come home to clean house, launder and work in the garden. Lunchtime is usually spent either at a friends or entertaining at home. After lunch an a chat its back home to iron and prepare the evening meal. I enjoy cooking so I put a lot of effort into my meals. My son arrives home from school at 4pm we have a cup of tea and discuss his day, play games or work with his computer. My husband and daughter arrive home at about 6.30pm and we have our meal. After bathing my son I read him a bedtime story. As president of the Womens Institute there is very often
